lb:
[Torpedo Salvo] charges +1.
Cheerful upgraded to Level 2.
During [Main Battery Salvo], adds a chance to activate [Cut-in].

Increases [Torpedo Salvo] damage by 40%.
Cheerful upgraded to Level 3.
During Night Battle, increases all damage by 30%.

After launching a [Torpedo Salvo] and during its travel, firing a [Main Battery Salvo] will combine both attacks into one, only landing when the [Torpedo Salvo] hits a target.
On contact, both attacks' damages will not affect CDs, ignores range, will use T-Adv, does 300% damage and will add all other damage increasing effects. Can only proc once per battle.
Cheerful upgraded to Level 4.

skills.name: Class Skill
skills.text:
Can attack from medium range, reload time: 7s
Can launch torpedoes from medium range; another torpedo cannot be fired unless an already launched torpedo has hit the enemy/expired

skills.name:
Undefeated
百戦百勝
skills.text: 1. When entering a battle, add a stack of 5% increased Crit Rate. Adds 1 stack every 10 seconds after, up to 10 times.2. On [Main Battery hit] 50% chance to set enemies on [Fire]. [Fire] deals 110% of Firepower over 10 seconds.3. On [Main Battery miss], following salvo reload reduced by 50%

skills.name:
Elegant and Indestructible
優雅不破
skills.text: 1. Increases armour by 20%. 2. Increase all allied ships' AA stat by 30%.3. Sailing at Flank Speed increases Oakland's damage by 15%.

comment: Honest, bright, slightly oblivious, Oakland enjoys life to its fullest both on and off the battlefield. It may be because she's a natural-born warrior, but she uses a fair amount of ammunition.
